title: Interop Resource Publish
description: This event represents the Resource as transformed and published by the interops platform.

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant for which the resource was published

resourceJson.description: The JSON string representation of the FHIR resource that was published.

metadata.description: The metadata associated to this load

embeddedResources.description: The List of resources that were embedded within, but have been removed from, the published resource

resourceJson.description: The JSON string representation of this embedded FHIR resource
